reviews.review: You have fun for a while and then slowly start running into the same exact things that make the game so irritating to play, The devs do not know how to balance their game, and even with a this big new update coming out soon it isn't going to fix the actual issues with how the game feels to play. I wish I could enjoy playing this game again but it is near impossible with all of its problems (random sounds no longer playing, hitting invisible objects, no real ultrawide support, and more). Save your time and money and buy something else.
This game has simultaneously one of the most amazing and the most toxic communities I have encountered. I continue to play this game for my friends, but find that it can be incredibly stressful.

Bom, nestas 22 horas de jogo, já entendi o motivos de algumas reclamações. Começando com o match-making, em uma partida, ou você joga contra jogador/es experientes (até demais ;-;), ou você joga com alguém que instalou o jogo segundos atrás ... que por sinal é uma partida rápida e gratuita. Em seguida vem os campers ... pelo amor de deus .... TEM MUITO CAMPER. Simplesmente o killer vai te seguir até o final do jogo (o cara dá literalmente a VIDA na partida) para te colocar no gancho e assistir você sofrer ... e para ajudar, vem os sobreviventes batatas. É osso ficar no gancho (indo para o segundo estágio do struggle) e os caras nos gens ... aí beleza né, quando terminam eles ajudam ... né .... NÃO, simplesmente vão para o outro gen mesmo estando safe para resgatar. E para terminar a cereja do bolo, os jogadores tóxicos. Literalmente jogar este jogo, significa entrar no bueiro de tanto jogador tóxico. Nunca o que você faz é aceitável para os jogadores (killers e sobreviventes). Vendo o lado positivo da história, você vai receber gratuitamente um curso de palavrões nas mais diversas linguagens existentes ... especialmente russo.
Game overall is a fun casual experience with friends

I don't know maybe I'm not the intended market but this got samey fast.  Played several runs with survivors and several with killer.  Even with the differing perks and powers there just wasn't real change to the gameplay.  After a while I kind of got bored trying to put survivors up on hooks.  It got old really fast.  Survivor side is a little more interesting, but when you're caught the game pretty much stop for you unless someone rescues you.

Fun game but lots of balancing issues that rarely get adjusted properly. Can be quite frustrating at times both as survivor and killer, depending on if you're running meta builds or not. Also a blast to get four other friends and run custom games together (but i dont have any)

I wish I could refund this but I can't. Don't listen to any review saying this game is fun because it's not. Survivor is only fun with friends but if you play with friends it comes at the cost of making the killers life a nightmare. The game is unbalanced to the highest degree. The devs don't listen to feedback and if they do it's never from the killer mains only survivors. The devs also do whatever they want.The playerbase is the worst I think I have every seen in any game with everyone being toxic including me because survivors will try to make you as mad as possible leading you to tunnel and camp them or in the worst case watch them teabag you at the exit gate. Everything about this game makes my blood boil yet I always come back because the idea of playing killer and having a good time is one of the enjoyable thoughts but playing is like shoving a cactus up your a**.

Edit: After playing a lot more and getting to red ranks I still believe what I said but maybe not as much. The playerbase sucks and it super toxic and sadly I have also become toxic but it seems like thats just what the game does.

The best Multiplayer "Horror" Team-Game you can own. It's an amazing experience with your friends that you really shouldn't miss out on. Of course it has some downsides, like toxic Random Mates or Killers, but what game does not have these people. Yes, you will get frustraded. Yes, you might slam your fist on your table, or ur first born child, but it's all worth it in the end.

这游戏不推荐购买，主要是匹配太坑了，说坑在什么地方之前我先谈谈这游戏的机制。这游戏是一个赛季一个赛季地结算，你本赛季玩的时间越长，越可能冲上高等级，等级越高匹配的对手越厉害，同样的赛季结束后的奖励也高一些，假设你本赛季是黄金，下个赛季开始就从青铜开始，每月13号刷新。但是，请注意，坑就在这匹配上面，这游戏会记录你冲赛季的最高等级，然后按照你的历史最高等级来匹配对手，哪怕你很长时间没玩这游戏了回坑，他也是按照你的历史最高等级来匹配对手，这样的匹配会遇到什么情况呢？你的游戏技术已经生疏，但是匹配到的对手依旧是老手，然后就被摁在地上磨擦，一次匹配是这样，两次匹配也是这样，系统只认你的历史最高等级，哪怕你已经很长时间没玩等级都掉到最低等级灰烬了，照样给你分厉鬼对手，贼TM恶心！如果还不明白，我打个比方，假设你第一个赛季冲上黄金，后面两个赛季都没玩了，等级已经掉到灰烬，然后当你回归这游戏的时候，系统会给你匹配黄金对手，系统才不会管你多久没玩这游戏了，只要你上过一次黄金，你在系统眼里就是黄金玩家了，然后就给你匹配黄金等级的对手，然后你就被摁在地上摩擦了......你想多打两把找回技术和手感，对不起，一直被摁在地上摩擦直到对这狗屎一样的匹配深恶痛绝并写下我这样的感悟最后再卸载掉游戏！
10/10 i hate this game so much
